page.title: 14Entertainment in Llangybi
page.content: Llangybi produces its own entertainment.Most summers there is a Village day comprising of a fun run,car treasure hunt, childrens sports and social evening.In Autumn the Pumpkin Clubs at the White Hart and Greyhound pubs judge the largest pumpkin and run a charity auction.On 5th November there is a village bonfire and fireworks display with refreshments.The church holds a Christmas Fair and the Hunt a boxing day meet.January is often enelivened by th Youth Club panto and Brownie concert.The closure ofthe school this year means an end to the Nativity plays and sports days and possibly,the annual pancake race.However,there are still village Hall events to enjoy such as French nights,jumblesales and slide shows about old Llangybi when life,it seems,was really exciting.
